旽旽旽
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 日, 屯, 暾
Связанный символ (и): Day, Tun, Tun

旽字的基本解释

旽
tūn
古同“暾”，初升的太阳。

旽
zhùn
〔旽旽〕诚恳。

旽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tūn］
［《集韻》他昆切，平魂，透。］
同“暾1”。
太阳初升貌。
[②]［zhùn］
［《集韻》朱閏切，去稕，章。］
见“旽2旽”。

旽字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　旽； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页490第27
【集韻】他昆切，音燉。與暾同。【玉篇】日欲出。　又朱閏切，音甽。旽旽，懇誠也。

旽字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
旽字的起名意思

暂无。

Luo
Basic explanation of words
Luo
tūn
Gu Tong "Tun", the rising sun.
Luo
zhùn
〔旽旽〕Sincere.
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tūn］
["Jiyun" He Kunqi, calm soul, thorough. ]
Same as "Tun 1".
The sun is rising.
[②]［zhùn］
["Ji Yun" Zhu Run cut, go to 稕, chapter. ]
See "旽2旽".
Luo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　旽; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 490 27
[Jiyun] He Kunqie, sound stewed. Same as Tun. [Jade articles] Ready to come out every day.　Zhu Run cut again, Yinzheng. Yan Yan, sincere too.
